text: Jack Chakrin (June 24, 1923 - June 28, 2015), known by his professional name of Jack Carter, was an American comedian, actor and host. He worked with Sid Caesar, Milton Berle, Imogene Coca, Carl Reiner, and Don Rickles. Carter was born in Brooklyn, New York. He died of respiratory failure in Beverly Hills, California, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television presenters Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Jack Carter (comedian)
